data.title: [Solved] Who was awarded the Nobel Peace Prize for founding the Grame
data.meta_description:
The correct answer is Muhammad Yunus.Key Points


	Muhammad Yunus is a prominent member of civil society, banker, economist, and social entrepreneur from Bangla
data.text:
-> SSC CHSL Answer Key has been released for the exam which was conducted from 1st to 11th July 2024.

-> Candidates can check their answer keys online by login through roll number and password.

-> The CBE Paper I (2024) was held from 1st to 11th July 2024.

-> SSC CHSL Notification 2024 had been released for 3712 vacancies.

-> The SSC CHSL is conducted to recruit candidates for various posts such as Postal Assistant, Lower Divisional Clerks, Court Clerk, Sorting Assistants, Data Entry Operators, etc. under the Central Government.

-> The SSC CHSL Selection Process consists of a Computer Based Exam (Tier I & Tier II).
